slotChar.description: Placeholder character in mask, default is underscore.

autoClear.description: Clears the incomplete value on blur.

unmask.description: Defines if model sets the raw unmasked value to bound value or the formatted mask value.

readonly.description: Whether the items are clickable or not.

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: focus
events.description: Callback to invoke when the component receives focus.

events.name: blur
events.description: Callback to invoke when the component loses focus.

events.name: keydown
events.description: Callback to invoke when a key is pressed.
